name: The Hunt For Halloween
description:
Hello!

Welcome to my game page.

This game is a submission for the Trick Or Treat Jam. It is about a ghost, aptly named Ghosty Boi, who wants to participate in the thrill of trick-or-treating. His transparent nature poses a unique problem. Using the help of his friends and sometimes rivals, he will need to collect items for the perfect costume.

Between becoming a chef, spider, and rap-battling a Raccoon, the journey is bound to be interesting. 

All code and art were made by me. There is no music as that was a whole new challenge, but I suggest these spooky songs to get you in the mood.

'This is Halloween' - the nightmare before Christmas

'Oggie Boogie's song' - the nightmare before Christmas

'Calling all the monsters' - China Anne McClain

I hope you enjoy the product of a, now hazy, week of work. There is a special challenge for those that read this far: somewhere in the game is a hidden duck. If you find it, put a *quack* in the comments. :)

P.S there are some bugs... but I have no clue how to fix them. They usually go away if you go to a new tab then come back or just reload the game. Here's to hoping you never have to deal with them :D
